title: About Me
text:
I have a deep passion for working towards environmental justice, social equity and global health through regenerative agriculture, a return to indigenous stewardship, promoting food sovereignty and the continued elevation of voices that are typically ignored and oppressed. I love to work with people, always be challenged in the workplace, and remain a lifelong learner.
Personal Interests bullet points here!

title: Graycen Mahon
text:
Hi! Thanks for stopping by my website, created by yours truly using R Studio- a programming language for statistical computing, graphics and website construction. My name is Graycen Mahon and I am originally from the Bay Area. I recently graduated from the University of California, Santa Barbara in 2023, with a Bachelor of Arts in both Environmental Studies and Sociology.

Please explore my page to review my work experiences, community involvement, other education, and person interests! I am happy to have you here.

title: Experience
text:
Winter Camp Manager (December 2022)

Gymtowne Gymnastics South San Francisco, CA


Oversaw the safety of children ages 4-13 in gymnastics activities


Ensured allergies, dietary restrictions, and personal medications were known for 20+ children, and supervised the administration of personal medications when necessary


Managed a staff of 25 employees and made weekly schedules


Created daily lesson plans for students satisfying a wide margin of ages and skill level


Facilitated conflict management and fostered a supportive, welcoming and fun environment for both the staff and 30+ participants over the 2 week period


Solved scheduling issues and encouraged all 25 staffers to work hard and do their best
